answers.answer: Good luck Jenny! I'm sure everything will go smooth! I can't wait to find out what you're having! Exciting!!!
good luck
Good luck and congrats!!!
Good Luck!
jenny i cant wait to hear the details, im sure everything will go well for you.  i dont know why i thought you were having a c section, good that you dont have to!
Good luck girl and can't wait to see pics.  Time really flew.
Best wishes! This is so exciting! I can't believe the time has come for the little one to come! Hope it all goes well and I can't wait to hear all the details :)
Good Luck! Congrats!!!
good luck mommy!
how exciting! Good luck!
good luck hun...i cant wait to find out what ur having
Good luck and keep us posted when u can! :)
Thanks so much everyone! You are all so sweet! I will keep you all posted on everything as soon as I can. Thanks again! :)
Good luck!!!!
I can't believe how quickly your pregnancy went!  Wish I had been around more for you!.. :(GOOD LUCK!  We Love Ya Jenny!
wow, today's the big day.  I missed this yesterday!  Good Luck and congrats.  Cant wait to find out the gender!!!
Good luck!
I hope everything is going well! Can't wait to see pics!! Best wishes Jenny!! You are in my thoughts and prayers! :)
Can't wait to hear the name :) All the best for today!!
Good luck and have an easy delivery!

question: Well I am being induced tomorrow! I have gestational diabetes, so to prevent the baby from getting too huge like Jameson was, my midwife wants me to deliver early. Jameson was 10:6 and broke his collarbone being born because of his size. He also had several other problems caused by my gestational diabetes.Its only 5 days before my due date though, so I hope it even makes a difference.My left hip is SO out of socket. I can barely walk and every step is painful. Which is tough because I have SO much to do today! I need to get my laundry all caught up and get food for the kids and make lists and clean the house. Good thing its summer and all the kids are home to help. :)I will post as soon as I can and let you all know the stats---gender, weight, etc.!!!!!!!!!!!!!Cross your fingers for me that everything goes smoothely. :)
title: Tomorrows the day!
